example.text: You can watch both these videos below. Governor Bill Lee also announced President Biden and his Secretary for the Department of Homeland Security were going to release illegal immigrants in Tennessee.

You can watch the full interview here or by clicking on the image below: Key Vote: National Defense Authorization Act FY2023 I voted against the National Defense Authorization Act for fiscal year 2023, which was packed with woke Democrat priorities that had a price tag of $847.3 billion dollars and didn't properly address our national security issues.
